headline.en: Nextcloud Hub 25 Autumn: Your digital workspace, ready in no time

text.en: Nextcloud Hub 25 Autumn makes it easy to get started with powerful collaboration while in control of your data. Discover our latest release.

en.alt: Nextcloud Hub 25 Autumn: Your digital workspace, ready in no time

headline.en: Do you already know this app?
Unlock the power of data with Analytics

text.en: Seamlessly connect data from multiple sources—external platforms, Tables, or Forms—into one unified hub. Create flexible reports and build meaningful dashboards, all integrated with the powerful Nextcloud AI for smarter insights and decisions.
A tasks app for Nextcloud. Easily sync tasks from various devices with your Nextcloud and edit them online. ✨ This is the first app migrated to Vue 3 for Nextcloud ✨
📝 Simple surveys and questionnaires, self-hosted! With Nextcloud 29 and Forms 4.2.0 you can now also archive old forms to cleanup your workspace 🧹

A library for all your recipes. To add a recipe to the collection, you can paste in the URL of the recipe, and the provided web page will be parsed and downloaded to whichever folder you specify in the app settings.

headline.en: Owning your data: The open source path with Nextcloud and MariaDB

text.en: Anna Widenius and Michael "Monty" Widenius help us unpack the challenges of open source, vendor lock-in, and owning your data.
